S

setVector(int) - Method in class game.Snake
This method updates the direction that the Snake is facing with the integer value given by the SnakeMove inner class.
Snake - Class in game
Snake object is a subclass extending from polygon which paints a snake on the game board.
Snake() - Constructor for class game.Snake
Default class constructor for the snake class that specifies the default shape, location, and rotation for the snake object.
Snake(Point[], Point, double) - Constructor for class game.Snake
Class constructor for the Snake class that specifies the shape, location, and rotation for the Snake object.
